hadiths.text: Narrated Utbah ibn AbdusSulami: Utbah heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: Do not cut the forelocks, manes, or tails of horse, for their tails are their means of driving flies, their manes provide them with warmth, and blessing is tide to their forelocks

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي كَرَاهَةِ جَزِّ نَوَاصِي الْخَيْلِ وَأَذْنَابِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Regarding It Being Disliked To Clip The Forelocks And Tails Of Horses
